profile.name: Hansa Jayathilaka
profile.title: Backend & DevOps Engineer
profile.description: Software Engineer specializing in building scalable backend solutions, optimizing DevOps pipelines, and driving innovation through Python, JavaScript, and Blockchain.
profile.bio_text_1: With over 6 years of hands-on experience, I have dedicated my career to mastering the intricacies of server-side architecture and infrastructure orchestration. My journey started at the University of Moratuwa where I earned my BSc (Hons.) in IT.
profile.bio_text_2: Holding a Diploma in Ethical Hacking, I build applications with a security-first mindset, focusing on distributed systems and automated CI/CD workflows.

achievements: Architected scalable backend microservices using Django and NestJS for high-traffic AI applications.
Optimized CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Implemented complex Next.js integrations for real-time dashboard analytics.
Managed Azure cloud services and serverless function deployments for fintech projects.
Developed robust API endpoints with NestJS adhering to RESTful and GraphQL standards.
Implemented secure authentication protocols using OAuth2 and JWT.
Engineered decentralized applications (DApps) on Ethereum using Solidity and .NET Core.
Designed and maintained PostgreSQL database schemas for large-scale enterprise data.
Integrated third-party payment gateways and blockchain oracle services.
